text: I know I like Mello Yello (Coca-Cola product) better than Mountain Dew (Pepsi-Cola product) and have ever since I 1st tried Mello Yello and I'll only drink a Dew if I run out of Mello Yello here in Houston.
Then again, without the Modern UI, Windows 8 doesn't offer many advantages, aside from faster performance, over Windows 7.
